sense.gloss: to set up, to establish, to organize, to lay down (rules), to make (an excuse)

sdata.j: ホールは↑仕切↑↓しき↓りを|↑設↑↓もう↓ける|↑前↑↓まえ↓は↑千↑↓せん↓↑人↑↓にん↓↑収容↑↓しゅうよう↓できた。
sdata.e: The hall could seat a thousand people before it was partitioned.

sdata.j: ↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓・・・↑入場↑↓にゅうじょう↓↑制限↑↓せいげん↓を|↑設↑↓もう↓ける|しかないでしょう。↑整理↑↓せいり↓↑券↑↓けん↓の↑配布↑↓はいふ↓とかで。
sdata.e: What a mess...I suppose there's nothing for it but restricting admissions. Handing out numbered tickets or something.
